items.title: Why BitStayz?
items.description: Experience the real estate evolution with our platform, leveraging fractional NFT ownership of premier short-term rental properties to unlock unprecedented avenues for wealth generation and passive income in the digital age.

items.title: Our vision
items.description: Our vision is to provide a collection of 100 top-tier short-term rental properties in Europe's most stunning cities, redefining luxury travel experiences while democratizing access to elite real estate investment opportunities through innovative fractional NFT ownership. We take care of everything else - cleaning, communication, repairs and etc. We will be happy if investors participate in marketing activities for their properties.

section_title.title: Investing in real estate made easy

texts.content: Imagine Sarah, a freelance graphic designer living in a bustling city, who has always dreamed of investing in real estate but found the traditional process daunting and inaccessible. With BitStayz platform, Sarah discovers a new opportunity to enter the real estate market without the need for a large upfront investment. Excited by the prospect, Sarah browses through the available short-term rental properties listed on the platform. She finds a charming apartment located in a popular tourist destination, represented as an NFT on the blockchain. Intrigued by the property's potential for rental income, Sarah decides to invest in a fraction of its ownership.Through a seamless process on the platform, Sarah purchases a portion of the property's NFT, instantly becoming a co-owner alongside other investors. As a property owner, Sarah is entitled to a share of the rental income generated by the apartment, all managed automatically through smart contracts. With her investment secured on the blockchain, Sarah can track the property's performance and rental income in real-time through the platform's intuitive dashboard. She enjoys the passive income generated by her investment without the hassle of property management, allowing her to focus on her freelance work and personal endeavors.
